metadata.title: CVE-2019-20628 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libgpac.a in GPAC before 0.8.0, as demonstratedby MP4Box. It contains a Use-After-Free vulnerability ingf_m2ts_process_pmt in media_tools/mpegts.c that can cause a denial ofservice via a crafted MP4 file.

criterions.comment: gpac package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
